## [blogdown: Creating Websites with R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/)

By [by Yihui Xie, Amber Thomas, & Alison Presmanes
Hill](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/)

**What is this?****Excerpt from ebook:** We introduce an R package, blogdown, in this
short book, to teach you how to create websites using R Markdown and
Hugo. If you have experience with creating websites, you may naturally
ask what the benefits of using R Markdown are, and how blogdown is
different from existing popular website platforms, such as WordPress.
